metadata.title: CVE-2021-22118 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Spring Framework, versions 5.2.x prior to 5.2.15 and versions 5.3.xprior to 5.3.7, a WebFlux application is vulnerable to a privilegeescalation: by (re)creating the temporary storage directory, a locallyauthenticated malicious user can read or modify files that have beenuploaded to the WebFlux application, or overwrite arbitrary files withmultipart request data.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
